config.taczweaponblueprints.general.desc: Settings related to the default pack
config.taczweaponblueprints.general.debu: Whether to enable debug mode for the default pack
config.taczweaponblueprints.blueprint.bl: Chance for a blueprint to spawn in a chest
config.taczweaponblueprints.blueprint.mi: Minimum number of blueprints to spawn if chance is met
config.taczweaponblueprints.blueprint.ma: Maximum number of blueprints to spawn if chance is met
config.taczweaponblueprints.blueprint.st: List of blueprints that players start with
config.taczweaponblueprints.blueprint.gu: List of guns that will not have blueprints generated for them
config.taczweaponblueprints.blueprint.am: List of ammo that will not have blueprints generated for them
config.taczweaponblueprints.blueprint.at: List of attachments that will not have blueprints generated for them
